description: The file defines a Flutter widget called HomeScreen, which serves as the main screen for role-based navigation within a health-oriented meal ordering app. It manages different user roles such as Admin, Manager, and Delivery Agent, displaying role-specific interfaces, navigation elements, and links to various management screens. The file includes multiple widgets for UI components, role selection, and role-specific card sections.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages role-based content display and navigation.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing selected role, navigation index, and building UI components.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A widget representing a list item with an icon and label, used inside role cards.

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: Widget for the drawer header displaying the current role.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header section with title and role selector pills.

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Decides whether to display role-specific cards in a grid or column based on screen size.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Creates the dropdown widget to select user roles.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Creates clickable role pills for quick role switching.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Provides the header title text based on the selected role.

methods.name: _adminOrders
methods.description: Builds the role card for orders management for Admin role.

methods.name: _adminMenu
methods.description: Builds the role card for menu management for Admin role.

methods.name: _adminUsers
methods.description: Builds the role card for users management for Admin role.

methods.name: _managerOrders
methods.description: Builds the role card for orders overview for Manager role.

methods.name: _managerLocations
methods.description: Builds the role card for locations and time slots for Manager role.

methods.name: _managerFeedback
methods.description: Builds the role card for feedback center for Manager role.

methods.name: _deliveryAssigned
methods.description: Builds the role card for assigned deliveries for Delivery role.

methods.name: _deliveryHistory
methods.description: Builds the role card for delivery history for Delivery role.
